item.title: Quick Thought: Universal translator and same language translator
item.description: Quick Thoughts are random thoughts looking for comments Let’s imagine a universal translator able to translate any language to any language. Sourcing a corpus of pair translation is a major hurdle. However there is an almost infinite corpus of pair translations: a language with itself; translating English to English is easy, even for a computer. Let’s give the blackbox universal translator three inputs: a source text, the language of the source text, the language of the desired translation.
